item.title: Compiler problem - rep for help
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Rofl just put this and let it find it for you jeez…

@echo off color 0a title Compiler if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo You have sucsessfully compiled pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler problem - rep for help
item.dc:creator: @Sunarpe Sunarpe
item.description:
@Sunarpe wrote:

[quote=“ForTheThrills, post:9, topic:396603”]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" -d ./bin/ src/*.java src/sign/*.java pause

That will work.[/quote]

Thanks! It worked! ^.^

Read full topic

item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -d ./bin/ src/*.java src/sign/*.java pause
That should work…

item.title: Compiler problem - rep for help
item.dc:creator: @Sunarpe Sunarpe
item.description:
@Sunarpe wrote:

[quote=“markdabest33, post:6, topic:396603”][quote author=Sunarpe link=topic=493776.msg3610054#msg3610054 date=1306493876]

mhhm are u a 64 bit os?

umm fairly sure it 64…
[/quote]

ok let fix up the code for ya mka?

“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe” this or

“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe”

If it still doesnt work here some envoirement variables you might want to add.
CLASSPATH:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin

CLASSPATH:
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

If you set your variables you will only need to have in your client run batchfile :
java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

hope this helped![/quote]

auctually - ifixed it by myself
it has _13 but i didnt have that version so i changed it

i repped for youir trouble!

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler problem - rep for help
item.dc:creator: @markdabest33 markdabest33
item.description:
@markdabest33 wrote:

[quote=“Sunarpe, post:5, topic:396603”][quote author=markdabest33 link=topic=493776.msg3610053#msg3610053 date=1306493778]
mhhm are u a 64 bit os?
[/quote]

umm fairly sure it 64…[/quote]

ok let fix up the code for ya mka?

“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe” this or

“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe”

If it still doesnt work here some envoirement variables you might want to add.
CLASSPATH:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin

CLASSPATH:
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

If you set your variables you will only need to have in your client run batchfile :
java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui

hope this helped!

Read full topic
